summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a boat name and includes a confidentiality notice. The email highlights the personal communication between Epstein and Staley, indicating a level of familiarity and possibly a business relationship.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email and is involved in a conversation regarding a boat name.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email and is engaged in a personal communication with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about personal matters, indicating a friendly relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on May 31, 2012.
Epstein inquires about the name of Staley's boat.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
There are typos in the email, as noted by Staley.
The email was sent from Epstein's vacation email address.
